verses.verse: And when Rachel<WH7354> saw<WH7200> that<WH3588> she bore Jacob no children,<WH3205> <WH3808> <WH3290> Rachel<WH7354> envied<WH7065> her sister;<WH269> and said<WH559> unto<WH413> Jacob,<WH3290> Give<WH3051> me children,<WH1121> or<WH518> else<WH369> I<WH595> die.<WH4191>

And Jacob's<WH3290> anger<WH639> was kindled<WH2734> against Rachel:<WH7354> and he said,<WH559> Am I<WH595> in God's<WH430> stead,<WH8478> who<WH834> hath withheld<WH4513> from<WH4480> thee the fruit<WH6529> of the womb?<WH990>

And she said,<WH559> Behold<WH2009> my maid<WH519> Bilhah,<WH1090> go in<WH935> unto<WH413> her; and she shall bear<WH3205> upon<WH5921> my knees,<WH1290> that I<WH595> may also<WH1571> have children<WH1129> by<WH4480> her.
And she gave<WH5414> him<WH853> Bilhah<WH1090> her handmaid<WH8198> to wife:<WH802> and Jacob<WH3290> went in<WH935> unto<WH413> her.
And Bilhah<WH1090> conceived,<WH2029> and bore<WH3205> Jacob<WH3290> a son.<WH1121>

And Rachel<WH7354> said,<WH559> God<WH430> hath judged<WH1777> me, and hath also<WH1571> heard<WH8085> my voice,<WH6963> and hath given<WH5414> me a son:<WH1121> therefore<WH5921> <WH3651> called<WH7121> she his name<WH8034> Dan.<WH1835>
And Bilhah<WH1090> Rachel's<WH7354> maid<WH8198> conceived<WH2029> again,<WH5750> and bore<WH3205> Jacob<WH3290> a second<WH8145> son.<WH1121>

And Rachel<WH7354> said,<WH559> With great<WH430> wrestlings<WH5319> have I wrestled<WH6617> with<WH5973> my sister,<WH269> and<WH1571> I have prevailed:<WH3201> and she called<WH7121> his name<WH8034> Naphtali.<WH5321>
When Leah<WH3812> saw<WH7200> that<WH3588> she had left<WH5975> bearing,<WH4480> <WH3205> she took<WH3947> <WH853> Zilpah<WH2153> her maid,<WH8198> and gave<WH5414> her Jacob<WH3290> to wife.<WH802>
And Zilpah<WH2153> Leah's<WH3812> maid<WH8198> bore<WH3205> Jacob<WH3290> a son.<WH1121>
And Leah<WH3812> said,<WH559> A troop cometh:<WH1413> and she called<WH7121> <WH853> his name<WH8034> Gad.<WH1410>
And Zilpah<WH2153> Leah's<WH3812> maid<WH8198> bore<WH3205> Jacob<WH3290> a second<WH8145> son.<WH1121>
And Leah<WH3812> said,<WH559> Happy<WH837> am I, for<WH3588> the daughters<WH1323> will call me blessed:<WH833> and she called<WH7121> <WH853> his name<WH8034> Asher.<WH836>

And Reuben<WH7205> went<WH1980> in the days<WH3117> of wheat<WH2406> harvest,<WH7105> and found<WH4672> mandrakes<WH1736> in the field,<WH7704> and brought<WH935> them unto<WH413> his mother<WH517> Leah.<WH3812> Then Rachel<WH7354> said<WH559> to<WH413> Leah,<WH3812> Give<WH5414> me, I pray thee,<WH4994> of thy son's<WH1121> mandrakes.<WH4480> <WH1736>

And she said<WH559> unto her, Is it a small matter<WH4592> that thou hast taken<WH3947> <WH853> my husband?<WH376> and wouldest thou take away<WH3947> <WH853> my son's<WH1121> mandrakes<WH1736> also?<WH1571> And Rachel<WH7354> said,<WH559> Therefore<WH3651> he shall lie<WH7901> with<WH5973> thee tonight<WH3915> for<WH8478> thy son's<WH1121> mandrakes.<WH1736>

And Jacob<WH3290> came<WH935> out of<WH4480> the field<WH7704> in the evening,<WH6153> and Leah<WH3812> went out<WH3318> to meet<WH7125> him, and said,<WH559> Thou must come in<WH935> unto<WH413> me; for<WH3588> surely I have hired<WH7936> <WH7936> thee with my son's<WH1121> mandrakes.<WH1736> And he lay<WH7901> with<WH5973> her that<WH1931> night.<WH3915>
And God<WH430> hearkened<WH8085> unto<WH413> Leah,<WH3812> and she conceived,<WH2029> and bore<WH3205> Jacob<WH3290> the fifth<WH2549> son.<WH1121>

And Leah<WH3812> said,<WH559> God<WH430> hath given<WH5414> me my hire,<WH7939> because<WH834> I have given<WH5414> my maiden<WH8198> to my husband:<WH376> and she called<WH7121> his name<WH8034> Issachar.<WH3485>
And Leah<WH3812> conceived<WH2029> again,<WH5750> and bore<WH3205> Jacob<WH3290> the sixth<WH8345> son.<WH1121>

And Leah<WH3812> said,<WH559> God<WH430> hath endued<WH2064> me with a good<WH2896> dowry;<WH2065> now<WH6471> will my husband<WH376> dwell with<WH2082> me, because<WH3588> I have born<WH3205> him six<WH8337> sons:<WH1121> and she called<WH7121> <WH853> his name<WH8034> Zebulun.<WH2074>
And afterwards<WH310> she bore<WH3205> a daughter,<WH1323> and called<WH7121> <WH853> her name<WH8034> Dinah.<WH1783>
And God<WH430> remembered<WH2142> <WH853> Rachel,<WH7354> and God<WH430> hearkened<WH8085> to<WH413> her, and opened<WH6605> <WH853> her womb.<WH7358>
And she conceived,<WH2029> and bore<WH3205> a son;<WH1121> and said,<WH559> God<WH430> hath taken away<WH622> <WH853> my reproach: <WH2781>
And she called<WH7121> <WH853> his name<WH8034> Joseph;<WH3130> and said,<WH559> The LORD<WH3068> shall add<WH3254> to me another<WH312> son.<WH1121>

And it came to pass,<WH1961> when<WH834> Rachel<WH7354> had born<WH3205> <WH853> Joseph,<WH3130> that Jacob<WH3290> said<WH559> unto<WH413> Laban,<WH3837> Send me away,<WH7971> that I may go<WH1980> unto<WH413> mine own place,<WH4725> and to my country.<WH776>

Give <WH5414> me<WH853> my wives<WH802> and my children,<WH3206> for whom<WH834> <WH2004> I have served<WH5647> thee, and let me go:<WH1980> for<WH3588> thou<WH859> knowest<WH3045> <WH853> my service<WH5656> which<WH834> I have done<WH5647> thee.

And Laban<WH3837> said<WH559> unto<WH413> him, I pray thee,<WH4994> if<WH518> I have found<WH4672> favor<WH2580> in thine eyes,<WH5869> tarry: for I have learned by experience<WH5172> that the LORD<WH3068> hath blessed<WH1288> me for thy sake.<WH1558>
And he said,<WH559> Appoint<WH5344> <WH5921> me thy wages,<WH7939> and I will give<WH5414> it.
And he said<WH559> unto<WH413> him, Thou<WH859> knowest<WH3045> <WH853> how<WH834> I have served<WH5647> thee, and how<WH834> thy cattle<WH4735> was<WH1961> with<WH854> me.

For <WH3588> it was little<WH4592> which<WH834> thou hadst<WH1961> before<WH6440> I came, and it is now increased<WH6555> unto a multitude;<WH7230> and the LORD<WH3068> hath blessed<WH1288> thee since my coming:<WH7272> and now<WH6258> when<WH4970> shall I<WH595> provide<WH6213> for mine own house<WH1004> also?<WH1571>

And he said,<WH559> What<WH4100> shall I give<WH5414> thee? And Jacob<WH3290> said,<WH559> Thou shalt not<WH3808> give<WH5414> me any thing:<WH3972> if<WH518> thou wilt do<WH6213> this<WH2088> thing<WH1697> for me, I will again<WH7725> feed<WH7462> and keep<WH8104> thy flock: <WH6629>

I will pass through<WH5674> all<WH3605> thy flock<WH6629> today,<WH3117> removing<WH5493> from thence<WH4480> <WH8033> all<WH3605> the speckled<WH5348> and spotted<WH2921> cattle,<WH7716> and all<WH3605> the brown<WH2345> cattle<WH7716> among the sheep,<WH3775> and the spotted<WH2921> and speckled<WH5348> among the goats:<WH5795> and of such shall be<WH1961> my hire.<WH7939>

So shall my righteousness<WH6666> answer<WH6030> for me in time<WH3117> to come,<WH4279> when<WH3588> it shall come<WH935> for<WH5921> my hire<WH7939> before thy face:<WH6440> every one<WH3605> that<WH834> is not<WH369> speckled<WH5348> and spotted<WH2921> among the goats,<WH5795> and brown<WH2345> among the sheep,<WH3775> that<WH1931> shall be counted stolen<WH1589> with<WH854> me.
And Laban<WH3837> said,<WH559> Behold,<WH2005> I would<WH3863> it might be<WH1961> according to thy word.<WH1697>

And he removed<WH5493> that<WH1931> day<WH3117> <WH853> the he goats<WH8495> that were ringstreaked<WH6124> and spotted,<WH2921> and all<WH3605> the she goats<WH5795> that were speckled<WH5348> and spotted,<WH2921> and every one<WH3605> that<WH834> had some white<WH3836> in it, and all<WH3605> the brown<WH2345> among the sheep,<WH3775> and gave<WH5414> them into the hand<WH3027> of his sons.<WH1121>
And he set<WH7760> three<WH7969> days'<WH3117> journey<WH1870> between<WH996> himself and Jacob:<WH3290> and Jacob<WH3290> fed<WH7462> <WH853> the rest<WH3498> of Laban's<WH3837> flocks.<WH6629>

And Jacob<WH3290> took<WH3947> him rods<WH4731> of green<WH3892> poplar,<WH3839> and of the hazel<WH3869> and chestnut tree;<WH6196> and peeled<WH6478> white<WH3836> streaks<WH6479> in them,<WH2004> and made the white<WH3836> appear<WH4286> which<WH834> was in<WH5921> the rods.<WH4731>

And he set<WH3322> <WH853> the rods<WH4731> which<WH834> he had peeled<WH6478> before<WH5227> the flocks<WH6629> in the gutters<WH7298> in the watering<WH4325> troughs<WH8268> when<WH834> the flocks<WH6629> came<WH935> to drink,<WH8354> that they should conceive<WH3179> when they came<WH935> to drink.<WH8354>
And the flocks<WH6629> conceived<WH3179> before<WH413> the rods,<WH4731> and brought forth<WH3205> cattle<WH6629> ringstreaked,<WH6124> speckled,<WH5348> and spotted.<WH2921>

And Jacob<WH3290> did separate<WH6504> the lambs,<WH3775> and set<WH5414> the faces<WH6440> of the flocks<WH6629> toward<WH413> the ringstreaked,<WH6124> and all<WH3605> the brown<WH2345> in the flock<WH6629> of Laban;<WH3837> and he put<WH7896> his own flocks<WH5739> by themselves,<WH905> and put<WH7896> them not<WH3808> unto<WH5921> Laban's<WH3837> cattle.<WH6629>

And it came to pass,<WH1961> whensoever<WH3605> the stronger<WH7194> cattle<WH6629> did conceive,<WH3179> that Jacob<WH3290> laid<WH7760> <WH853> the rods<WH4731> before the eyes<WH5869> of the cattle<WH6629> in the gutters,<WH7298> that they might conceive<WH3179> among the rods.<WH4731>
But when the cattle<WH6629> were feeble,<WH5848> he put<WH7760> them not<WH3808> in: so the feebler<WH5848> were<WH1961> Laban's,<WH3837> and the stronger<WH7194> Jacob's.<WH3290>

And the man<WH376> increased<WH6555> exceedingly,<WH3966> <WH3966> and had<WH1961> much<WH7227> cattle,<WH6629> and maidservants,<WH8198> and menservants,<WH5650> and camels,<WH1581> and asses.<WH2543>
